about_the_game:
Description:

Discover Kingdom of Nyabur, a pixel art RPG where adventure and magic blend to deliver an unforgettable epic. Step into the shoes of Prince Arvin, a young hero determined to restore his devastated kingdom. Joined by loyal allies, embark on a quest for the legendary elemental stones and face the dark forces threatening the balance of the world.

Dive into a universe inspired by timeless classics, elevated by a modernized experience: a dynamic Active Time Battle (ATB) system, spectacular summons, and a world brimming with details and secrets waiting to be uncovered. Let yourself be captivated by this unique adventure, where every decision shapes your destiny. The Kingdom of Nyabur awaits you... will you rise to the challenge?

Key Features:

  • Strategic Combat and Impressive Powers:Master the art of real-time tactical combat, where each hero has unique skills and devastating powers.

  • Summoning : 
    Summon powerful creatures to turn the tide of battle, adding a deep tactical layer to each encounter.

  • Dynamic Exploration with Day-Night Cycle:Immerse yourself in a kingdom where events shift with the passage of time, revealing new quests, encounters, and mysteries at each phase of the day.

  • Captivating Puzzles and Hidden Secrets:
    Solve puzzles inspired by classic games and uncover treasures and hidden paths that enrich the storyline.

  • Immersive Experience and Enchanting Soundtrack:
    Every visual detail and musical note pulls you deeper into a fantastical journey through the realm of Nyabur.

Discover Kingdom of Nyabur, a pixel art RPG where adventure and magic blend to deliver an unforgettable epic. Step into the shoes of Prince Arvin, a young hero determined to restore his devastated kingdom. Joined by loyal allies, embark on a quest for the legendary elemental stones and face the dark forces threatening the balance of the world.

Dive into a universe inspired by timeless classics, elevated by a modernized experience: a dynamic Active Time Battle (ATB) system, spectacular summons, and a world brimming with details and secrets waiting to be uncovered. Let yourself be captivated by this unique adventure, where every decision shapes your destiny. The Kingdom of Nyabur awaits you... will you rise to the challenge?

Key Features:

  • Strategic Combat and Impressive Powers:Master the art of real-time tactical combat, where each hero has unique skills and devastating powers.

  • Summoning : 
    Summon powerful creatures to turn the tide of battle, adding a deep tactical layer to each encounter.

  • Dynamic Exploration with Day-Night Cycle:Immerse yourself in a kingdom where events shift with the passage of time, revealing new quests, encounters, and mysteries at each phase of the day.

name: Kingdom of Nyabur

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Step into the enchanting world of Kingdom of Nyabur, where adventure and magic blend to create an unforgettable epic. Take on the role of Prince Arvin, a young hero determined to restore his devastated kingdom.
